scripts.build: npm run mantic:build && npm run doc:build && npm run fomantic:build && npm run semantic:build && ng build
scripts.publish: npm run mantic:publish && npm run doc:publish && npm run fomantic:publish && npm run semantic:publish
scripts.mantic:publish: cd dist\mantic-ui && npm publish --access public && cd ..\..
scripts.mantic:publish-rc: cd dist\mantic-ui && npm publish --access public --tag rc && cd ..\..
scripts.mantic:bpl: npm run mantic:build && npm run mantic:publish-local
scripts.doc:publish: cd dist\mantic-ui-doc && npm publish --access public && cd ..\..
scripts.doc:publish-rc: cd dist\mantic-ui-doc&& npm publish --access public --tag rc && cd ..\..
scripts.doc:bpl: npm run doc:build && npm run doc:publish-local
scripts.fomantic:publish: cd dist\fomantic-ui && npm publish --access public && cd ..\..
scripts.semantic:build: ng build semantic-ui & npm run semantic:postbuild
scripts.semantic:postbuild: cd projects/semantic-ui && npm run postbuild && cd ../..
scripts.semantic:publish: cd dist\semantic-ui && npm publish --access public && cd ..\..
scripts.semantic:publish-rc: cd dist\semantic-ui && npm publish --access public --tag rc && cd ..\..
scripts.semantic:bpl: npm run semantic:build && npm run semantic:publish-local
scripts.update:eslint: ng update @angular-eslint/schematics@ --force --allow-dirty && npx npm-check-updates "/^@typescript-eslint/" -u  && npx npm-check-updates "/^eslint/" -u && npm i --force
